Learning Resource Updates

New docs and major updates.

16-June-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Videos in Folder Report
  • Description: This sample uses the CMS API to generate a report on all the videos a specified folder. The report is shown in JSON and also generated in CSV format. It fetches the video data in batches of 100, so if there is an API timeout or some other error, you will still have some of the data.
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/code-samples/cms-api-sample-videos-in-folder-report.html

Major updates

  • Title: Overview: Brightcove Live API
  • Description: Updated supported AWS regions to include Seoul (ap-northeast-2)
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/getting-started/overview-brightcove-live-api.html#Support_aws_regions
  • Title: Overview: In-Page Experience Client API
  • Description: Updated all sample code to use the correct version of the experience id
  • Link: https://gallery.support.brightcove.com/develop/overview-page-experience-client-api.html
  • Title: Interactive Examples Gallery
  • Description: Interactivity Examples fixed
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/interactivity/examples/

9-June-2023

Major updates

  • Title: Creating a Network Log
  • Description: Added more general instructions beyond the specific use case the doc addressed
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/troubleshooting/creating-network-log.html
  • Title: Viewability
  • Description: Added new pause_in_background_tab settings
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/playback/brightcove-player-viewability.html
  • Title: Overview: Content Protection
  • Description: Added explanation of how token authentication works in Video Cloud
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/content-protection/overview-content-protection.html#ttl
  • Title: Interactive Examples Gallery
  • Description: Updated the embed code for all samples to make them work with the new release of Interactivity
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/interactivity/examples/index.html
  • Title: Brightcove Player 7 Migration Guide
  • Description: Plugins table updated
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/references/bcp7-migration-guide.html#Plugins
  • Title: Google Analytics Self Configuration with Beacon
  • Description: Added section for creating a stars custom metric
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/analytics/third-party/ga-self-configuration.html
  • Title: Creating a JSON Web Token (JWT)
  • Description: Added audience claim for Playback Restrictions
  • Link: https://general.support.brightcove.com/developer/create-json-web-token.html#Claims_for_Playback_Restrictions

2-June-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Brightcove Ad Insights
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how advertising insights can help you optimize your ad monetization plans.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/module/ad-insights.html

Major updates

  • Title: Playlist Endscreen Plugin
  • Description: Fixed playlist endscreen plugin sample and updated code
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/playlist-endscreen-plugin.html
  • Title: Configuring Third-Party Tracking for a Portal Experience
  • Description: Steps for migrating from UA to GA4 added to Integrating with Google Analytics section.
  • Link: https://gallery.support.brightcove.com/experiences/portal/other/configuring-third-party-tracking-portal-experience.html#google
  • Title: Google Analytics Plugin
  • Description: Steps for migrating from UA to GA4 added
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/google-analytics-plugin.html
  • Title: Google Tag Manager Plugin for Brightcove Player
  • Description: Information about GA4 added
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/google-tag-manager-plugin-brightcove-player.html
  • Title: Overview: Content Protection
  • Description: Added explanation of how token authentication works in Video Cloud
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/content-protection/overview-content-protection.html#ttl
  • Title: Test Jobs and Integration Mode
  • Description: Added details on getting an API Key and using the Request Builder
  • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/integrations/test-jobs-and-integration-mode.html
  • Title: Overview: Platform APIs
  • Description: Added new APIs
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/getting-started/getting-started-brightcove-apis.html#videocloudapis

26-May-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Overview: Engagement Insights for Beacon
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how Engagement Insights for Beacon allow you to understand viewer engagement and optimize your content strategy.
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/analytics/engagement-insights/overview.html
  • Title: Summary Reports: Engagement Insights for Beacon
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the reports included in the Summary tab for Beacon Engagement Insights.
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/analytics/engagement-insights/summary-reports.html
  • Title: Viewer Engagement: Engagement Insights for Beacon
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the reports included in the Engagement tab for Beacon Engagement Insights.
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/analytics/engagement-insights/viewer-engagement.html
  • Title: Content: Engagement Insights for Beacon
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the reports included in the Content tab for Beacon Engagement Insights.
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/analytics/engagement-insights/content-metrics.html
  • Title: Sample Dynamic Overlays
  • Description: Added some sample dynamic overlays for Cloud Playout that can be used for testing
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/channels/cloud-playout/sample-overlays/index.html
  • Title: Brightcove Interactivity Heartbeat Module Update
  • Description: Steps to access up to the minute analytics data for Interactivity and legacy HapYak
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/interactivity/analytics/getting-up-to-the-minute-data.html

Major updates

  • Title: Google Analytics Self Configuration with Beacon
  • Description: Updated steps for Google Analytics 4

  • Description: Added additional configuration fields
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/advertising-freewheel-plugin.html
  • Title: Autoplay Considerations
  • Description: Updated to match the options currently available in the player
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/playback/autoplay-considerations.html
  • Title: SSAI: Ad Block Detection and Auto-Failover
  • Description: Added subsection on implementing auto-failover for those writing custom code against the player

19-May-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Overview of the Integrations Module
  • Description: New integrations module in Studio
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/integrations/integrations-module/getting-started/getting-started-integrations-module.html
  • Title: Setting Up an Automatic Ingestion Folder on Dropbox
  • Description: Set up a connection to Dropbox and select a folder that Video Cloud will watch to automatically ingest videos placed in the folder.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/integrations/integrations-module/watched-folders/dropbox.html
  • Title: Setting Up an Automatic Ingestion Folder on Google Drive
  • Description: Set up a connection to Google Drive and select a folder that Video Cloud will watch to automatically ingest videos placed in the folder.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/integrations/integrations-module/watched-folders/google-drive.html

Major updates

  • Title: Interactive Examples Gallery
  • Description: Updated all samples to use Interactivity
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/interactivity/examples/index.html

  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/troubleshooting/brightcove-player-troubleshooting-guide.html
  • Title: API Operations for Client Credentials Requests

  • Title: Overview: Brightcove Native SDK for Android

  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/basics/overview-brightcove-player-sdk-android.html
  • Title: Google Tag Manager Plugin for Brightcove Player
  • Description: Information updated to reflect GA4 support
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/google-tag-manager-plugin-brightcove-player.html
  • Title: Brightcove QoE Analytics
  • Description: Changed feature offering to only include Video start time and Summary charts
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/module/qoe-analytics.html
  • Title: Publishing Videos to Social Media Platforms
  • Description: Section added about Youtube Shorts

14-April-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Brightcove Player Sample: Display Duration
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn to display the duration of the video over the video poster that is displayed. The duration disappears when the play button is pressed.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/code-samples/brightcove-player-sample-display-duration.html
  • Title: Seek Buttons Plugin
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the seek buttons plugin for Brightcove Player. This plugin will allow you to seek forward/back through a video for a configurable amount of time.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/seek-buttons-plugin.html
